name: Isolation Principle Test
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS NOT A FULL FLEDGED GAME BUT A PROTOTYPE FOR A SURVEY FOR A BACHELORS THESIS!

Hello and thank you for looking at this project! I was kindly given the permission by André Cardoso (Mix and Jam) to use his Celeste Project to create this prototype. It's a collection of short segments that should teach the player the mechanics of the game. I tried using the isolation principle since its often perceived as "the best" way to teach players. 

If you tried out my protoype, it would help me a lot if you would also fill out this survey about it! Don't worry, it's only five questions and you will remain anonymous.
However I would like to use the data I gained from this survey for my Bachelors Thesis, so proceed on your own accord!

Please note: ONLY WINDOWS AND PS4 CONTROLLER SUPPORT!
